website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural body butter that helps pregnant and postpartum women reduce stretch marks.
pros: Absorbs into the skin without trouble
Also works well on rough skin, such as heels and elbows
Customers report effectiveness in preventing marks during pregnancy
cons: Orange smell can be too strong for some
Doesn’t affect stretch marks that are already there

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to cocoa butter and Shea butter to use during pregnancy, I can't stand the smell of either one. I found best best Mama body butter and fell in love with the citrus smell! It seriously smells like oranges and it's such a refreshing smell that was not overpowering and was actually enjoyable to put on! It left my skin feeling smooth, but not greasy! I have given a container to a friend as well when she was pregnant and she loved it! An entire container lasted me almost my entire pregnancy using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since my second trimester, and so far no stretch marks! I use it on my tummy and breasts after every shower. It’s quite a large jar and a little goes a long way, I have about a third of the jar left. I’m currently 32 weeks and I find myself using it more often now that my skin is feeling a bit more dry. This product smells great and it’s very moisturizing. I love that it’s organic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product! The texture, the pleasant citrus with a slight cocoa butter smell is fabulous. My husband even complimented my soft and fragrant baby belly! It feels good on the skin and hasn't caused any issues with my pregnancy sensitivities. I've used the old Burts bees belly butter for my previous 3 pregnancies, but they changed their ingredients not to my liking. This product is wonderful so far and I look forward to seeing in a few months if it helps prevent stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Andolina

customer_reviews.title: Smells STRONG
customer_reviews.text: This product while it spreads well right out of the shower when your skin is warm, smells very, very, VERY strong. Not good for pregnant women. Even my husband smelled it as soon as he walked in the door, haha. It smells nice at first of orange and chocolate but it’s so strong it gave me headache. I needed to remove it as soon as possible and wash it off. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BELLY BUTTER!
customer_reviews.text: I love this belly butter. When I first received it, I couldn't believe how natural it was. It feels and smells homemade(in a good way). I love that I can pronounce every single ingredient and know that it is safe for me and my baby. It smells like orange tootsie rolls, but that could be my pregnancy hormones! I would definitely recommend this belly butter. The texture is like butter. It is a bit on the oily side but that is exactly what you want from belly butter. It doesn't stain clothes and smells amazing!. I will be ordering this for all of my pregnancies and maybe just to have around for an intense moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Bria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great scent & no stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I used this throughout my pregnancy and really loved it versus a few other products I tried. This was my first baby and I didn't get a single stretch mark (though I know this could just be genetics). Still, I would highly recommend this belly butter and will purchase again if we are blessed with a second baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie  Alice Lillard Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only 25 weeks so it is still a little early, but I've been using this, Palmer's, and another brand and I like this one the best. I don't feel like it "dries up" easily and my belly still feels well moisturized by the end of the day. The smell is great if you like fresh, clean types of scents--kind of reminds me of the smell of the pink starburst candies. The texture threw me off at first, but I really like this product. I always use it after a shower when my pores are most opened and receptive. So far it's great! Just bought another tub of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and smell. Relieves itching skin very well. I used It at the beginning of 2nd trimester and didn’t have any stretch marks. But! I don’t think my skin pron to stetch marks anyways as my mom never had any either without the use of any fancy creams. I used it mainly to relieve itchy belly skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Ustinova

customer_reviews.title: Great body butter!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this body butter! It has a nice, not powerful, sweet orange scent. I’ve been applying to my baby bump and breasts for the past 5 months! Not one stretchmark as of yet. It feels so nice to put on and helps a ton when my skin is super itchy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna D

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I am stretch mark prone and I am 33 weeks with no stretch marks (yet). I think this product has helped a lot. It is a little "greasy" when you put in on but it soaks in and is gone in a little bit. I am weird about being slimy, but this is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stretch mark preventer!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found this belly butter!!! I used it daily from 8wks-40wks pregnant and I only got a few tiny stretch marks at 39 weeks. This to me was incredible since really really bad stretch marks run in my family. I am a believer!!! I will definitely be recommending this to all my friends and use for any future pregnancies! It also smells amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie09

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: This made your skin very soft, however, it was to greasy for me. I think to many oils. I did use the whole tub but went with a different brand for my next try.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Fancy coconut oil, but I’m not mad.
customer_reviews.text: It’s basically coconut oil with some essential oils thrown in, so you know exactly what you’re putting on your body, but with that said, it applies almost exactly like coconut oil. A little goes a long way. Smells like those chocolate oranges you get for Christmas. All in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: very greasy feeling and the orange smell is not good. It is more like a hard vasaline than ...
customer_reviews.text: very greasy feeling and the orange smell is not good. It is more like a hard vasaline than a cream. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Blosser

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! I used it throughout my winter pregnancy and I only have one small stretch mark on my side (hardly noticeable). My container arrived with a crack near the lid, and they promptly sent me a new one, no questions asked! It lasted for a long time even with me using it twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING and spreads easily
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING and spreads easily. It's too early to tell if it help prevent stretch marks but I will update in a couple months. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cailing

customer_reviews.title: I’ve seen no stretch marks and it just smells so good. I’ve continued to use it postpartum to help ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this starting early in my pregnancy due to crazy itchy skin. I used it just about every day until my son was born. I’ve seen no stretch marks and it just smells so good. I’ve continued to use it postpartum to help my C section scar heal.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Kept the stretch marks away!
customer_reviews.text: I used for most of my pregnancy and i did not get not a single stretch mark! Love it and it smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Green

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell, very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: This body butter smells amazing and spreads very easily, so a little goes a long way. Can’t comment yet about preventing stretch marks, but it does leave my skin feeling very moisturized without being greasy. Love the simple list of all natural ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: F Wang

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after trying several similar products and this one far surpasses the rest. Besides being organic, the scent and the texture, which I'm super sensitive to, were very pleasant. I bought it for post-birth marks and will for sure use it during my next for preventative marks as well as it's safe for pregnancy. I highly recommend it to all, not only pregnancy-related marks.
customer_reviews.author: Alki918

customer_reviews.title: Received opened and used body butter
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product for the first time. I received it and the body butter was opened and used! Gross! It smells good but sadly I can't use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cream
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to my products especially when pregnant. This works great, I have used it through 2 pregnancies . I did not get any stretch marks (more genetic than anything) but this immediately took away any itch. I told all my pregnant friends to buy It!
customer_reviews.author: tammie Parent

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of days and so far is my favorite smells really good like orange and I love the ...
customer_reviews.text: I only been using it for a couple of days and so far is my favorite smells really good like orange and I love the organic products I highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the last week of my 2nd pregnancy, and this time around, all that I used on my stomach was the Best Nest Belly Butter. This stuff is amazing!! Not one single new stretch mark, no itching, and it smells amazing! So wish I knew about this when I was pregnant the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Mander

customer_reviews.title: After the Mama Belly Butter Sweet Orange Scent
customer_reviews.text: After the Mama Belly Butter Sweet Orange Scent, smelled to strong for my preggo sent, Best Nest sent me the same product unscented and i love it. It feels really good on my skin. I was positive surprised how Best Nest cared for my opinion and made sure i was satisfied with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Rausa

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Has an orange cocobutter smell lovely. It feels nice and i think its doing its job. Its still early im only 4 months we'll see if it keeps the stretchies at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: she said it feels super nice and that it smells ridiculously good like Oranges
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is now 7 months pregnant with her first child. She absolutely loves it, she said it feels super nice and that it smells ridiculously good like Oranges. We will have to see after she has the baby whether or not it does in fact help with preventing Stretch marks. But so far she would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This belly butter is amazing! I'm 31 weeks pregnant, and no stretch marks at all. I've been using this product since 3 months pregnant. I just bought another container to get me through the rest of pregnancy and post pregnancy. The citrus smell is relaxing, and it goes on smooth with no grease feel.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this belly butter is overpowering and nauseating!! I waited to write this until I passed out of my first trimester when a lot of things smelled gross, but I still can't stand the smell. Will probably toss the rest of the jar as I really dread using it...
customer_reviews.author: Swallowtail

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin really soft
customer_reviews.text: I used this during my pregnancy & it helped my skin stay soft. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: JBuff

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's organic, it smells good, it makes your skin soft, it rubs in good and doesn't leave your skin feeling gooey, and it works! It really helped soothe the itching feeling I would get, definitely will use this for all my pregnancies!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amaris

customer_reviews.title: Great scent! I swapped to something a little thicker ...
customer_reviews.text: Great scent! I swapped to something a little thicker for the end of my pregnancy but was a great beginning cream when your just starting to grow still has a good thickness to it also.
customer_reviews.author: Dayle Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice citrus scent. Bought back in October and just started to use it so cannot report on its effectiveness yet, but it came highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mama To Be

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell that only intensified my pregnancy nausea
customer_reviews.text: Horrible smell that only intensified my pregnancy nausea! Not sure how the rating is so high?? Wish I could return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sweet orange scent and received the unscented product. I am dissatisfied with this scent and wish to receive the product i paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I have loved using Mama Belly Butter by Best Nest throughout my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have loved using Mama Belly Butter by Best Nest throughout my pregnancy! It is very moisturizing and smells delicious! I started using it right away around 17 weeks and it has helped prevent stretch marks for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best belly butter out there! Keeps mrs keep hydrated for 48 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Steinle

customer_reviews.title: It took a few applications to figure out how to best apply it due to its consistency
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on smooth and seems to stay on all day. It took a few applications to figure out how to best apply it due to its consistency. However, once I figured it out, I fell in love. I'm ready for my next tub, and I'm not even looking at any other products. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Mama Baby Butter
customer_reviews.text: I love Mama Baby Butter! I have tried a few different products, but this is the only one I decided to reorder during my pregnancy because I love the way it leaves my skin feeling and I also love the refreshing scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome belly cream
customer_reviews.text: Awesome belly cream. Totally organic and smells great too. Usually the problem with the organic belly creams is the smell that isn't so pleasant. This spreads great and lasts a long time too. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have really enjoyed this belly butter throughout my pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this belly butter throughout my pregnancy. I am on my second container now, it's lightweight and not heavy or greasy. Helps with the itching and dryness and smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely loved it on all accounts
customer_reviews.text: Used it all along my pregnancy, and absolutely loved it on all accounts.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Akbarian

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not the same product ingredients that I first ordered...
customer_reviews.author: ARE

customer_reviews.title: Great service and product!
customer_reviews.text: The company surprised me with direct contact after my purchase and after receiving their product. I was very impressed with their level of customer service and care and devotion to customer satisfaction. The product itself feels pure and good. And smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney P.

customer_reviews.title: I like the consistency of this belly butter
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency of this belly butter, but the smell is awful. It claims to be a chocolate orange smell, but it doesn't smell that way to me. I used the whole jar because I liked the consistency, but every morning the smell was enough to make me gag.
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Love this belly butter
customer_reviews.text: Love this belly butter!! Smells amazing and isn't greasy like other products. Easily blends into skin and doesn't stain clothes! Very happy to find a natural product that works. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and my wife loves the product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service and my wife loves the product. 8 months pregnant and not a single stretch mark. I just wish I could buy more than 1 at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since I found out I was pregnant. So far I have had no signs of any stretch marks and I am now in my 3rd trimester. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: B.A.2016

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not prevent stretch marks but it smells nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I used the body butter my whole pregnancy and now even post pregnancy. I love the way the lotion smells. It leaves your skin feel great. I now recommend this product to all of my pregnant friends
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Crane

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell & texture. It melts onto your skin. It also really relieves my itchy belly & soothes my skin. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sueann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Butter!
customer_reviews.text: I got the product! And its working wonderfully well. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: JOSIE LIM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So pure and feels great on your skin! It has really helped smooth my itchy uncomfortable belly
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dee

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and smells really bad
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrible. Has a strong chemical smell. I had to throw mine out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jackie valmonte

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This belly butter is fantastic! I like that the ingredients are organic and it leaves my belly feeling moisturized all day. I'll continue to use it throughout my pregnancy!
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: This was by far my favorite. It seemed good and didn't stain my clothes
customer_reviews.text: I bought four different kinds of belly butter/oil. This was by far my favorite. It seemed good and didn't stain my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product has a great citrus smell. Not greasy at all after rubbing in the product. Helped with the itching.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: It didnt do anything but give me a horrible rash which enhanced my stretch marks some more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to reduce some stretch marks and lighten them up. It didnt do anything but give me a horrible rash which enhanced my stretch marks some more!! I tried calling to get my money back and instead they are making me go through a hassle instead of just returning it. I do not recommend this item to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharilys

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product felt great on the skin, but I could not stand the smell! It is unbelievably strong. However, after writing the company they refunded and asked that I donate or share with someone and that's what I will do! Hopefully another mama-to-be will enjoy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Hartz

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars only bc the seal was broken on the ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars only bc the seal was broken on the package. Didnt look as if it had been used, but ... other than that Smells good
customer_reviews.author: David Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stretch Marks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best belly butter ever! It smells wonderful, and was one of the few scents I could stand while I was pregnant. I thought I was destined to have tons of stretch marks, since I gave them on my legs, but I used this butter several times a day and have zero pregnancy stretch marks! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this belly butter. It's so natural, only simple and organic ingredients. I tend to read every single ingredient before purchasing cosmetic products and this butter is the best you'll ever find out there. I was using another lotion until they started putting aluminium in it, terrible. But this butter is amazing, all natural ingredients, no synthetic stuff of any kind. My belly has grown a lot and I don't have a single stretch mark using it every day at night. Oh, and the smell is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed this product so far. I find the smell to be different from what I'm used to (sort of citrusy?) but I still like it a lot. The texture is somewhat strange but once it's you rub it in it feels perfect. There's no residue and I don't feel like I need to wipe it right off. There's no drying time, either, so I can just get dressed right after I rub it in. I'm not very far along in my pregnancy, so I can't speak to it's efficacy, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Chubeck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pregnancy and I did want a cream/butter that was organic and natural. I love, love, love this belly butter. It smells divine and makes my skin feel amazing. For this reason, I think I use more than most of the others that have reviewed it because I'm definitely going to have to get more before month 9. It's been particularly great during this drying winter. I cannot speak to it's ability to impact stretch marks as I've not grown enough yet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Breton

customer_reviews.title: Developed Itch reaction
customer_reviews.text: Is it the product or me? I’ve never had an allergic reaction to a product before in my life. However, after using this for about a week my belly became super itchy by the middle of the day. At first I thought it was just skin stretching for my baby belly but when I skipped using this product The itch disappeared ..... used it again it itched again .... stopped and the itch was gone. Personally I like the smell but I’m tossing the product due to the itch reaction.
customer_reviews.author: ottergirl

customer_reviews.title: Sent an item that was 2 months from it's expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the quality of this item but I am incredibly disappointed, i bought it 3 months ago but had not opened it until today. Immediately i could smell that the oil had gone rancid, i looked at the expiration date on the bottom and it expired a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cmsween

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice clean orange scent
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice clean orange scent; people have actually commented when entering a room and said "ooh something smells good in here, orangey!" It's not too strong, but it does linger for the first hour or so of wearing it. The texture is nice to spread on the skin and it is NOT oily thereafter. I've really liked this product so far and have been using it for about 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: perrka

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell= Nausea
customer_reviews.text: My wife is dying with the orange smell! it makes her feel nausea at the point that she cannot eat anything. I don't understand how a cream for pregnant women has such a strong smell!
customer_reviews.author: Diego L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.....
customer_reviews.text: Love this belly butter. This is the first I have used that has a very mild sent and leaves my skin feeling so smooth. In addition, this is wonderful for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Clem

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the second jar already. 31+ weeks and no stretch marks. I use it twice a day. Orange smell is nice and I like the consistency.
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: Works well to moisturize!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this balm while I was preggo. Not too greasy but kept my tummy from itching.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product! Kept my skin smooth during pregnancy and NO stretch marks!
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Body Butter & Smells Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Soft, not greasy and fast absorbing. Definitely a butter-like consistency vs lotion. I use it every night. And it smells great, like chocolate orange.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Stretch mark prevention
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice a day for my entire pregnancy and did not receive any stretch marks. I thought it smelled good, husband didn’t though.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely perfect and the scent is to die for!
customer_reviews.author: lizette noel

customer_reviews.title: I like the way the product feels
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the product feels. However, I really cannot stand the smell , it's a bit too strong for me. I would return it if I could. I tried it tonight and it actually made me feel itchy. I wanted to love it. :/
customer_reviews.author: S. Fundock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Absorbs quickly. The smell reminds me of lemon flavored tootsie rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea2639

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! Just ordered my second jar. I was looking for something for my stomach. I'm a little over 7 pregnant. So far I didn't notice new stretch marks but the few I had from my 4 year old seem to be getting " deep and more defined with this pregnancy. Once I started using this cream they seem to being getting less deep in my skin( if that makes sense) . Stilll no additional stretch marks on my dark caramel skin. I will be using this the remainder of my pregnancy. Only draw back I think it's a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller stands behind their products! A++
customer_reviews.text: Alrhough I can't tell you if this product actually helps with stretch marks, the seller has gone above and beyond to make sure I am satisfied. I tried this product when I was pregant and couldn't stomach the smell BUT I wasn't aware of an unscented version! I will be receiving the unscented version soon and I am positive that I will have all good things to say about it!
customer_reviews.author: PWidner

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. Doesn't go on the way I thought it would. Doesn't dry that quickly, does smell nice tho. Would return but Amazon doesn't accept returns on these products. I love their prenatal vitamins tho!
customer_reviews.author: Maizy86Top Contributor: Baby
